H0.text: Secondary consumers are carnivores that eat herbivores.

H1.text: Tertiary consumers are carnivores that eat herbivores.

H2.text: Primary consumers are carnivores that eat herbivores.

H3.text: Quaternary consumers are carnivores that eat herbivores.

A4.text: Carnivores are animals whose nutrition and energy requirements are met by consumption of animal tissues.

A5.text: Carnivores have comparatively short digestive systems, as they are not required to break down the tough cellulose found in plants.
